/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings painted in vibrant shades of pink and red, their colors standing out against the clear blue sky. Cars and buses can be seen navigating the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. In the distance, a tall building looms, its height dwarfing the surrounding structures and adding depth to the image. The overall scene is a blend of urban life and architectural charm, showcasing the vibrant cityscape of Beijing.
